```{r}
#| echo: false

library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
penguins |>
  ggplot(aes(x = body_mass_g,
             y = flipper_length_mm,
             color = species)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Penguins Body Mass compared to Flipper Length",
       x = "Body Mass", y = "Flipper Length")
```
